casebody.data:
NC ASS'N OF EDUCATORS, INC., et al.
v.
STATE of NC. No. 228A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 3, 2015. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, for the State of North Carolina. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. Narendra Ghosh, Chapel Hill, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. Philip A. Hostak, for North Carolina Association of Educators, Inc., et al. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, for the State of North Carolina. Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Attorney Geneal, for the State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of November 2015 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of November 2015."
